topic: Netflix offered a  million prize to anyone who could improve their recommendation algorithm by just 10%. It took 3 years, and the winners only barely made it. The algorithm that decides what you watch tonight cost more to crack than most startups raise.
title: Netflix Paid $1M to Hack You üß†
narration: Did you know Netflix once offered a million-dollar prize to anyone who could improve their recommendation algorithm by 10%? It took three years, and winners barely achieved it! The algorithm shaping your nightly binge cost more to crack than most startups raise.
videoPrompt: Scene 1: A bustling boardroom with people brainstorming, papers scattered, emphasizing urgency. Scene 2: A digital screen showing complex mathematical formulas and code flowing. Scene 3: A dramatic countdown timer, building tension. Scene 4: A person triumphantly lifting a trophy, symbolizing victory. Photorealistic, dynamic, warm tones.
ytDesc: Discover how Netflix's million-dollar challenge to improve recommendations unfolded. It took years and a massive brainpower boost! #Netflix #TechChallenge #Innovation
